title: Design System Configuration
description: Configure your design system with essential parameters. The system intelligently derives full token sets from these values.

colors.title: Colors
colors.description: Essential color settings. The system automatically generates color scales, semantic colors, and dark mode variants.

primary.title: Primary
primary.description: Main brand color for buttons, links, and primary UI elements.

secondary.title: Secondary
secondary.description: Supporting color used to generate the neutral gray scale.

accent.title: Accent
accent.description: Accent color for highlights and call-to-action elements.

background.title: Background (Light)
background.description: Base background color for light mode.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Dark theme overrides for quality dark mode.

secondary.title: Dark Secondary (Optional)
secondary.description: Optional: custom secondary/gray tone for dark mode.

typography.title: Typography
typography.description: Font settings. The system generates a fluid typographic scale automatically.

fontScale.title: Font Scale Ratio
fontScale.description: Multiplier for heading sizes (1.2 = minor third, 1.333 = perfect fourth, 1.5 = perfect fifth).

spatialRhythm.title: Spacing
spatialRhythm.description: Spacing system settings. The system generates a spacing scale automatically.
